_sText:
<iframe width="420" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/gQHO1rsz0WQ" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

A Multiplayer Slender map. Collect all 8 pages then kill Slenderman to win the game.

Any bugs, please report them here.

**V.2 Release**

- Pages are now presented as models identical to the ones from "Slender: the 8 pages" (Thank you Darnias)

- Fixed Slender not dying after being shot

- Players can no longer respawn after the first page is collected

- Fixed a case where Slender would not kill you

- Fixed a bug which would spawn a 9th page

**V.1 Release**

- Initial release
